mapper.insert: insert into land (`id`, `date`, city, area, land_no, land_name, `status`, acreage, land_usage, volumetric_rate, deal_price, build_price, premium_rate, `owner`, remark, detail_url ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{landNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{landName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acreage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{landUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volumetricRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{buildPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{premiumRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update land set `date` = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, land_no = #{landNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, land_name = #{landName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acreage = #{acreage,jdbcType=REAL}, land_usage = #{landUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volumetric_rate = #{volumetricRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deal_price = #{dealPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, build_price = #{buildPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, premium_rate = #{premiumRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `owner` = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_url = #{detailUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `date`, city, area, land_no, land_name, `status`, acreage, land_usage, volumetric_rate, deal_price, build_price, premium_rate, `owner`, remark, detail_url from land where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, `date`, city, area, land_no, land_name, `status`, acreage, land_usage, volumetric_rate, deal_price, build_price, premium_rate, `owner`, remark, detail_url from land
mapper.delete: delete from land where TO_DAYS(`date`) >= TO_DAYS(#{date,jdbcType=DATE});
mapper.insert:
insert into land (`id`, `date`, city, area, land_no, land_name, `status`, acreage, land_usage, volumetric_rate, deal_price, build_price, premium_rate, `owner`, remark, detail_url ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.landNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.landName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acreage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.landUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.volumetricRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dealPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.buildPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.premiumRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.detailUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
